p: Arnaud Marchant, Director of the Institute for Medical Immunology, Universit√© libre de Bruxelles, Belgium, discussed the disease from an immunologist's perspective. While it starts with a viral infection, Covid-19 shows clear signs of an inflammatory disease, with massive infiltration of immune cells in the tissue, most prominently the lungs [ 13]. But markers of inflammation are also found in the blood: cytokines, chemokines, C-reactive protein and fibrin degradation products, and correlate with disease severity.
